extendedInfo.description: Enjoy WPL to Go, the libraryâs mobile app! This app will allow you to:* Search the libraryâs catalogue to find books, movies, music and more using a great new way to search! Just type the first couple of letters of words and see the search in action while you type. For instance, âsu coâ retrieves books written by Suzanne Collins.* Enjoy one-click access to eLibraries Manitoba for downloadable audio and e-books.* Check your library account, renew materials and place requests.* Map the location of any branch and get phone and hours info.* Access the libraryâs Twitter, Facebook and other social media accounts.* Scan the ISBN of any book, anywhere, to see if itâs available at your local library.

reviews.title: HTC Evos 3D
reviews.comment: LOVE This app, I use the library website all the time this is much faster and easy to use. Only improvements needed would be to get the rest of the online services running like add to wish list or edit, get balance of fees and a quick link to the desktop website for the features you can\'t get currently in this app. Still love it and if you use the library regularly you will love it too!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s very useful!
reviews.comment: I would like a widget and or notifications for this app so I wouldn\'t have to click the app all the time to check if I have any books on hold ready for pick up or any books due (: It would be very convenient if it was improved.
reviews.author: Charly Panelo
